columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the snapshot

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource in Azure

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The disk provisioning state

columns.name: create_option
columns.description: Specifies the possible sources of a disk's creation

columns.name: disk_access_id
columns.description: ARM id of the DiskAccess resource for using private endpoints on disks

columns.name: disk_encryption_set_id
columns.description: ResourceId of the disk encryption set to use for enabling encryption at rest

columns.name: disk_size_bytes
columns.description: The size of the disk in bytes

columns.name: disk_size_gb
columns.description: The size of the disk to create

columns.name: encryption_setting_collection_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the encryption is enables, or not

columns.name: encryption_setting_version
columns.description: Describes what type of encryption is used for the disks

columns.name: encryption_type
columns.description: The type of the encryption

columns.name: gallery_image_reference_id
columns.description: A relative uri containing either a Platform Image Repository or user image reference

columns.name: gallery_reference_lun
columns.description: Specifies the index that indicates which of the data disks in the image to use

columns.name: hyperv_generation
columns.description: Specifies the hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine

columns.name: image_reference_id
columns.description: A relative uri containing either a Platform Image Repository or user image reference

columns.name: image_reference_lun
columns.description: Specifies the index that indicates which of the data disks in the image to use

columns.name: incremental
columns.description: Specifies whether a snapshot is incremental, or not

columns.name: network_access_policy
columns.description: Contains the type of access

columns.name: os_type
columns.description: Contains the type of operating system

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The snapshot sku name

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The sku tier

columns.name: source_resource_id
columns.description: ARM id of the source snapshot or disk

columns.name: source_unique_id
columns.description: An unique id identifying the source of this resource

columns.name: source_uri
columns.description: An URI of a blob to be imported into a managed disk

columns.name: storage_account_id
columns.description: The Azure Resource Manager identifier of the storage account containing the blob to import as a disk

columns.name: time_created
columns.description: The time when the snapshot was created

columns.name: unique_id
columns.description: An unique Guid identifying the resource

columns.name: upload_size_bytes
columns.description: The size of the contents of the upload including the VHD footer

columns.name: encryption_settings
columns.description: A list of encryption settings, one for each disk volume

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
